cells.data:
-- assocs :: Map k a -> [(k, a)]
on assocs(m)
    set c to class of m
    if c is list then
      zip(enumFromTo(1, length of m), m)
    else if c is record then
        set dict to (current application's ¬
            NSDictionary's ¬
            dictionaryWithDictionary:(m))
        zip((dict's allKeys()'s ¬
            sortedArrayUsingSelector:"compare:") as list, ¬
            dict's allValues() as list)
    else
        {}
    end if
end assocs
